channel.title: TravelgateX Documentation â€“ Getting Started
channel.description: Recent changes in Getting Started on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Core: Get Accesses
item.description: Get accesses. List of all of your accesses available. query { admin { accesses { edges { node { accessData { name isActive code } error { code type description } } } } } } Get accesses with filters. List of all of your accesses available choosing the filters, the filters are expecified in DOCS in the playground. query { admin { accesses(filter: { accessID: "0" }) { edges { node { accessData { name isActive code } error { code type description } } } } } }

item.title: Core: Update Access
item.description: Update an Access. Update values of an Access and check DOCS in playground to see what you can modify. mutation { admin { updateAccess(input: { code: "", isActive: false }) { accessData { code isActive } error { code type description } } } }
